trans-unit.source: Stores an ordered pair of integers, which specify a <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" />.
trans-unit.target: Archivia una coppia ordinata di Integer che specificano <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size> class is used to specify a height and width through the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A> property for <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> and other graphics classes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Size> classe viene utilizzata per specificare un'altezza e larghezza tramite il <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A> proprietà <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> e altre classi di grafica.

trans-unit.source: You can perform operations on a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> by using the overloaded operators such as <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile eseguire operazioni su un <xref:System.Drawing.Size> tramite gli operatori di overload, ad esempio <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: L'unità per il <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> del <xref:System.Drawing.Size> struttura dipendono il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> le impostazioni per il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto utilizzato per disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure from the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> dalla struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure from which to initialize this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da cui inizializzare la struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure from the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> dalla struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> specificata.

trans-unit.source: The width component of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Componente larghezza del nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The height component of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Componente altezza della nuova struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure from the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> dalle dimensioni specificate.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.%23ctor%2A> costruttori e <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a Windows Form that contains a label named `Label1` and call the `IntializeLabel1` method in the form's constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollare il codice in un Windows Form che contiene un'etichetta denominata `Label1` e chiamare il `IntializeLabel1` metodo nel costruttore del form.

trans-unit.target: Prima struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> da sommare.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: Seconda struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> da sommare.

trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> che rappresenta il risultato dell'operazione di aggiunta.

trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollarlo in un Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `AddSizes` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Handle del modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventi e chiamate di `AddSizes` metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> gestione degli eventi, passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to convert.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure by rounding the values of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure to the next higher integer values.
trans-unit.target: Converte la struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> specificata in una struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, arrotondando i valori della struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> agli interi immediatamente più alti.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure this method converts to.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> in cui questo metodo esegue la conversione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure that has a <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> value of 0.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> che ha un valore di <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> pari a 0.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: Tests to see whether the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure with the same dimensions as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se l'oggetto specificato è una struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> con le stesse dimensioni di questa struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> and has the same width and height as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> è una struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> e ha la stessa larghezza e altezza di questa <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un codice hash per questa struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che specifica un valore hash per questa struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: You should avoid depending on <xref:System.Drawing.Size.GetHashCode%2A> for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Size> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: È consigliabile evitare di in base alle <xref:System.Drawing.Size.GetHashCode%2A> per i valori univoci, come due <xref:System.Drawing.Size> oggetti con gli stessi valori per i relativi <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> proprietà possono restituire lo stesso codice hash.

trans-unit.source: This behavior could change in a future release.
trans-unit.target: Questo comportamento potrebbe cambiare nelle versioni future.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical component of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il componente verticale di questa struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The vertical component of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure, typically measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Componente verticale di questa struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, in genere misurato in pixel.

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: L'unità per il <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> del <xref:System.Drawing.Size> struttura dipendono il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> le impostazioni per il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto utilizzato per disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure has width and height of 0.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se questa struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> ha larghezza e altezza pari a 0.

trans-unit.source: This property returns <see langword="true" /> when this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure has both a width and height of 0; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce <see langword="true" /> quando questa struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> ha larghezza e altezza pari a 0. In caso contrario, restituisce <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollarlo in un form contenente un pulsante denominato `addButton` e associare il `addButton_Click` (metodo) con il pulsante <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> evento.

trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> a sinistra dell'operatore di uguaglianza.

trans-unit.target: Verifica se due strutture <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="sz1" /> and <paramref name="sz2" /> have equal width and height; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />se <paramref name="sz1" /> e <paramref name="sz2" /> hanno la stessa altezza e larghezza; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: Crea una stringa leggibile che rappresenta questa struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to convert.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure by truncating the values of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to the next lower integer values.
trans-unit.target: Converte la struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> specificata in una struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, troncando i valori della struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> agli interi immediatamente più bassi.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure this method converts to.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> in cui questo metodo esegue la conversione.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use static <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Round%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Truncate%2A> methods to convert a <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come utilizzare static <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Round%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Truncate%2A> metodi per convertire un <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> per un <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è progettato per essere utilizzato con Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a form that contains two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> objects named `Label1` and `Label2`, and then call this method from the form's constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollarlo in un form contenente due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> gli oggetti denominati `Label1` e `Label2`e quindi chiamare questo metodo dal costruttore del form.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal component of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene e imposta il componente orizzontale di questa struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal component of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure, typically measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Componente orizzontale di questa struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, in genere misurato in pixel.

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used to draw.
trans-unit.target: L'unità per il <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> del <xref:System.Drawing.Size> struttura dipendono il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> le impostazioni per il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto utilizzato per disegnare.
